help.short: Location. Values from: `az account list-locations`. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=<location>`.
ID of the ILB IP configuration to receive the tap.
ID of the NIC IP configuration to receive the tap.
The VXLAN port that will receive the tapped traffic.
Location. Values from: `az account list-locations`. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=<location>`.
The VXLAN port that will receive the tapped traffic.
The reference to the private IP address on the internal Load Balancer that will receive the tap.
The reference to the private IP Address of the collector nic that will receive the tap.
